column4: Hello! I've just installed Ubuntu Gusty and in the Restricted Drivers window, i've tried enabling the nvidia driver but it says i don't have the nvidia-glx-new package. Should I install this package via synaptic or is there any way to have my Nvidia card working? THANKS!

Hello! I've just installed Ubuntu Gusty and in the Restricted Drivers window, i've tried enabling the nvidia driver but it says i don't have the nvidia-glx-new package. Should I install this package via synaptic or is there any way to have my Nvidia card working? THANKS!
